title: Jack and Jones Men's Basic V-Neck T-Shirt, Pack of 3, Plain Slim Fit in White, Black, Blue, Grey
descriptions:
Discover the Jack & Jones Men's Basic V-Neck T-Shirt pack, a versatile set of three slim-fit tees in timeless colors: white, black, blue, and grey. Designed to complement your urban lifestyle, these t-shirts feature a classic V-neck style that adds effortless flair, whether you're aiming for a casual or sporty-elegant look. Their modern, yet timeless design pairs perfectly with denim or a tailored suit, ensuring you're stylishly dressed for any occasion.

Crafted from a blend of 92% cotton and 8% elastane, these shirts offer a natural, comfortable fit that gently highlights your masculine silhouette without feeling restrictive. Their breathable fabric provides optimal comfort for all-day wear, while the simple, logo-free design enhances versatility. Care instructions are straightforward: machine wash inside-out at up to 40°C on delicate, and tumble dry on low. With these Jack & Jones V-neck tees, you’ll always showcase your best style, whether at work or play.
